attributes.action: Provide financial aid for British school before providing for foreign schools.
attributes.additional_details:
Provide financial aid for British schools before sending aid abroad, like the £650 million given to Pakistan to fund their schools. This will be our next generation who will have a sub standard education due to mixed age/ability over-crowded classes with too few teachers, while foreign countries offspring benefit from our taxes, while our children suffer.

It needs to stop. British children first.
